name: dicom-mr-classifier
label: SciTran: DICOM MR Classifier
description: Extract metadata and determine classification from raw DICOM data. Compatible with Siemens, Philips, and GE DICOMs.
author: Michael Perry <lmperry@stanford.edu>

timezone.description: Time Zone to which all timestamps should be localized. This will set the default time zone in the Gear and thus localize the timestamps to that time zone. Examples: 'America/Los_Angeles', 'America/New_York'. [default = 'UTC'].

sync.description: Synchronize classification definitions with the latest known updates found at scitran-apps/dicom-mr-classifier [default = true].
